com.pacman.game
Class Vector2

java.lang.Object
  com.pacman.game.Vector2

public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object

Class representing a 2d vector of floats with many helper methods for easy vector manipulations and math. Many of the methods return @this which makes it easy to chain statements such as (new Vector2(10,5).add(3,7).sub(1,5).nor())

Author:
Thaer
